title: ✿ BEAUTIFUL, LARGE Lincoln Square studio - W/D IN UNIT - central air
posting_body: SEE VIDEO (copy and paste the YouTube link into your browser):  https://youtube.com/shorts/S71tPqD0IK8?feature=share
Gorgeous, large studio apartment for rent in the Ravenswood / Lincoln Square area!
This is a high 1st floor unit in a walk-up building at Eastwood and Leavitt.
Only 2.5 blocks from both the Damen and the Western brown line stations.
Large living room will fit both living room and bedroom furniture
Central air and gas heat (paid by tenant)
Tenants pay for gas, electric, and a $40/month utility fee for water/trash/sewer
Pets ~40 pounds or less are welcome (two pets max) - dogs with a $500 pet fee and cats a $295 pet fee
$395 non-refundable move-in fee per apartment (no security deposit)
$75 application/credit check fee per adult applicant
Applications are taken on a first come, first serve basis.
To rent this apartment, the following are due up front:
